title: Application Strategies for the Advance Organizer Model in Online Real-Time Science Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of fundamental scientific concepts and experience using online learning tools
context.additional_context: An environment where smartphones are the primary learning tool, combining real-time interaction with asynchronous learning materials

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain the structure of science concepts by at least 80% using the advance organizer model
Effectively utilizing Zoom tools (small-group discussions, screen sharing, etc.) with over 75% frequency in online real-time classes
Accuracy in solving science problems using advance organizer-based learning strategies improves by over 20% compared to baseline in summative assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
